Markets: How the tables have turned. After getting trounced in 2022, the Nasdaq is outpacing its index peers thanks to a rise in tech stocks to start 2023. We’ll see if the momentum continues this week, when a bunch of tech companies and Tesla report earnings.

 

NATION

Celebration turns to tragedy in Southern California <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZTY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D4778891e> Police work near the scene of a mass shooting in Monterey Park, California, on January 22, 2023 <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZTY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E4778891e> Robyn Beck/AFP via Getty Images
Ten people were killed when a gunman opened fire in a ballroom dance studio in Monterey Park, CA, on Saturday night. The attack <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZTc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C363214bf> occurred as thousands celebrated Lunar New Year’s Eve in this majority Asian American city just east of Los Angeles.

Yesterday, police found <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZUQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3bf64ca0> the suspected gunman, 72-year-old Huu Can Tran, dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound in a white van in Torrance, a city about 30 miles from Monterey Park.

That van fit the description of a vehicle used in another attempted shooting Saturday night in the city of Alhambra, when people at a dance hall disarmed a gun-carrying man before he fled the scene. Officials believe there is a connection between the shooting in Monterey Park and the thwarted incident in Alhambra, but have not yet discovered a motive.

It is the deadliest mass shooting in the US since 21 people were killed at a school in Uvalde, TX, last May, and the 33rd mass shooting so far this year.

“The first suburban Chinatown”

Monterey Park was the first city in the continental US to have a majority of residents with Asian ancestry: Of its current 60,000 residents, 65% are of Asian descent, and they’ve established Monterey Park as a hub of Chinese culture in the San Gabriel Valley. The city is dotted with Asian American restaurants and grocery stores, and Chinese films are frequently screened there, per the AP.

Monterey Park, decked out with red lanterns, had been looking forward to hosting its Lunar New Year fair this weekend after Covid canceled it in the last two years. Historically drawing crowds of more than 100,000 people, its Lunar New Year celebration is one of the largest free street fairs in Southern California. The second day of festivities, which was set for Sunday, was canceled following the attack (though authorities said there was no connection between the two).

Big picture: The Asian American community was approaching this Lunar New Year’s celebration with both an eagerness to gather IRL again, but also trepidation <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZTg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C4adfd0c9> over the surge in anti-Asian hate crimes during the pandemic. Advocacy group Stop AAPI Hate said in a statement that this attack, “on one of the most important days of the year for many Asian Americans…is sending shockwaves through our community.”

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZTk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C0b139406>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZUE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5372576d>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C514a3c25>  

WORLD

Tour de headlines People attend the 50th annual March for Life rally on the National Mall Chip Somodevilla/Getty Images
Roe v. Wade at 50. Sunday marked the 50th anniversary of the now-scrapped SCOTUS decision that granted the federal right to an abortion. Abortion rights supporters marched <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C56ad452d> in cities across the country, drawing attention to the myriad legislative battles over abortion access that are now being fought at the state and local levels. Days before, anti-abortion activists staged the first March for Life in Washington, DC, since Roe v. Wade was overturned by the Supreme Court.

DOJ finds more classified docs at Biden’s home. Investigators found six more items <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1366b679> with classified markings at President Biden’s Delaware residence following a 13-hour search on Friday. On the Sunday talk shows, both Democrats and Republicans said they were concerned about these and other findings of classified docs that have dripped out in the past few weeks. Biden said he has “no regrets” about his handling of the situation, and his team and other Dems have tried to emphasize how Biden has cooperated with authorities in their investigation.

A busy weekend of playoff football. The Chiefs handled the Jaguars, my Eagles demolished the Giants, Cincinnati trounced Buffalo (with Damar Hamlin attending in-person), and the 49ers beat the Cowboys. Next Sunday’s conference championship games will determine who plays in the Super Bowl: Philly will face San Francisco, and the Chiefs will meet the Bengals in a rematch of last year’s AFC Championship Game.



TOGETHER WITH TAXACT

Let’s get fiscal <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4JmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6929ae9a> TaxAct <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4JmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca63a8dde>
Rummaging through receipts, compiling stacks of documents, dreading the idea of an audit…indeed, the most taxing time of year is ~officially~ here.

And if the software providers of tax seasons past left you wanting more, it’s time to let TaxAct <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4JmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5ab03e56> take control.

It’s a stress-free switch: Simply upload a PDF of last year’s return, and TaxAct’s user-friendly software takes it from there. Have questions along the way? Their Xpert Assist team of tax experts can answer ’em all—and even give your return a quick review before you file, too—at no extra cost (!!!).

You have nothing to lose except a whole lottta stress. Gain peace of mind with TaxAct today <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYWM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4JmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ced8ffd30>.



ENTERTAINMENT

‘Avatar 2’ tops $2b at the box office <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D35060f3d> Still from Avatar sequel <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E35060f3d> 20th Century Studios
It’s James Cameron’s world; we’re just swimming in it.

The director’s film, Avatar: The Way of Water, topped $2 billion <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cee3e9352> at the box office this weekend, becoming just the sixth movie in history to reach the milestone. Cameron is responsible for three of those six—Avatar, Titanic, and Avatar 2 (the others are Avengers: Endgame, Star Wars: The Force Awakens, and Avengers: Infinity War).

It will be just a matter of days until Avatar 2 climbs from No. 6 on the list to No. 4, leaping over Infinity War ($2.04 billion) and The Force Awakens ($2.07 billion) as it heads into its seventh week in theaters.

When that happens, the movie could earn another accolade: being profitable. Before the release of the uber-costly Avatar 2, Cameron said <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6a6f0efb> it was the “worst business case in movie history” and would need to become the third- or fourth-highest grossing film of all time to break even.

Zoom out: James Cameron is the movie theater equivalent of Shohei Ohtani—a superstar playing on a sorry team. Cinemas are not in a good place right now: Last week, Regal (whose parent company went bankrupt) said it was closing 39 locations in the US, and AMC has lost all of its meme-stock juice.

Good news for them, though, is that ol’ reliable Cameron plans to release three more Avatar installments in the next five years.

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C03957720>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C46829bd3>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C04ae180e>  

CALENDAR

The week ahead GIF of Mr Krabs sighing while doing acounting work SpongeBob SquarePants/Paramount Global via Giphy
Tax filing szn: The IRS will start accepting tax returns today through April 18. And in case you weren’t excited already—many Americans will probably see a lower refund this year, because several Covid-era tax breaks expired.

Oscar noms announced: If you need any movie recs, the nominations for the Academy Awards will be revealed tomorrow. All Quiet on the Western Front, The Banshees of Inisherin, Elvis, and The Fabelmans are expected to rack up the most nominations.

Economic happenings: Microsoft, Tesla, IBM, and Southwest Airlines highlight this week’s earnings reports. Full-year GDP data for 2022 will drop on Thursday. And an inflation report (the one most closely watched by the Fed) arrives Friday.

Elon Musk will return to the stand today in a trial over his infamous Tesla tweet in 2018.

On Tuesday, a Senate subcommittee will hold a hearing on Ticketmaster’s market dominance in light of the T-Swift tour debacle.

International Holocaust Remembrance Day is Friday.

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators Ken Griffin Michael Kovac/Getty Images
Stat: While the world convulsed and markets tanked in 2022, Ken Griffin’s Citadel was busy making the most mone <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZUI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca7c45827>y of any hedge fund…ever. According to estimates from LCH Investments, Citadel hauled in $16 billion for its clients last year, topping the $15 billion made by John Paulson in 2007 through his bet against subprime mortgages. By making boatloads for its clients, Citadel did pretty well for itself, too, charging $12 billion in fees and expenses.

Quote: “We’ve got a way to go to ensure women in leadership receive the same respect as their male counterparts.”

Incoming New Zealand Prime Minister Chris Hipkins described the misogyny his immediate predecessor, Jacinda Ardern, faced while in office and said men have a “responsibility <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30326536.3401248/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZWw_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMyNjUzNi4zNDAxMjQ4/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cde50bebb>” to call out abuse of women when they see it happening. Ardern announced her resignation last week, saying she “no longer [had] enough in the tank” to continue as leader of the Kiwis. Hipkins, a fellow member of the Labour Party, will be sworn in on Wednesday.

Read: How Charlie Javice got JPMorgan to pay $175 million for…what exactly? Good morning. We did it, folks—we made it through the darkest timeline. The sun will set at 5pm in New York City tonight, and the next pre-5pm sunset won’t be until November 6. It’s basically pool weather.

—Neal Freyman, Sam Klebanov, Matty Merritt, Max Knoblauch, Abby Rubenstein

Markets: Stocks staged a comeback <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cabaf5257> yesterday, closing higher with the tech-heavy Nasdaq leading the way, as tech giants looked to cut costs by cutting jobs. Netflix stock soared on the news that it gained more subscribers than expected, since everyone keeps binge watching its original programming. So, if you bought Netflix for $1 when it IPOed 21 years ago and hung onto it all this time…good for you.

 

TECH

That was a brutal week for tech layoffs <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D1529e2f5> An illustration of a tech CEO cutting an employee's computer in half <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E1529e2f5> Hannah Minn
Across the United States, tens of thousands of tech workers are waking up to the longest weekend of their professional lives.

Google parent company Alphabet became the latest tech giant to conduct mass layoffs <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C378dd98e>, beginning to let go of 12,000 employees (~6% of its workforce) yesterday morning. And while layoffs have been hitting tech for months now, this week felt particularly painful: Three of the biggest tech companies in the world—Alphabet, Microsoft, and Amazon—all announced job cuts that affected 40,000 employees combined.

That brings total layoffs in the tech industry to more than 200,000 <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3a13fbc9> over the last year, the FT notes.

That’s a huge number

But it only underscores Big Tech’s breathtaking hiring spree during the pandemic. Believe it or not, most Big Tech workforces are up—way up—since the beginning of Covid. Let’s take a look at the numbers:

Microsoft hired 40,000 people from June 2021 to June 2022. So after the recent layoffs, it’s still up 30,000 employees (or more than one Visa) in 18 months.

Alphabet’s 12,000 layoffs represent ~33% of the 36,751 staff it hired in the single year to September 2022.

Meta hired more than 26,000 employees in 2020 and 2021; it recently cut 11,000 jobs.

So what’s going on? Big Tech companies feasted during the Covid boom times, believing they’d never get heartburn later on. Now, facing a deteriorating economic environment, they’re letting go of some “moonshot” ideas, promoting efficiency <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf4fa9dc9>, and being more surgical about their investments (like in AI).

Finally, there’s one elephant in the room: Apple. Maybe it got lost while using Apple Maps, but the iPhone maker remains the only Big Tech company that hasn’t yet announced layoffs. One factor, CNBC suggests <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc134002b>, could be that it hired far more methodically than its peers during the pandemic. Apple increased its headcount by just 6.5% in the year to September 2022—about the same growth rate it’s had since 2016.—NF

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZDk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C57f47947>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf00594a4>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C079b5c68>   

TOGETHER WITH MUGSY

Guys, comfortable jeans don’t exis-… <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYno_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMxJmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C17111010> Mugsy <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYno_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMxJmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5e2a487c>
We all begrudgingly accepted the idea that jeans ≠ comfort. But like your ol’ cargos with side pockets, that’s pretty dated. Especially now that Mugsy’s designed the most comfortable jeans ever made <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYkE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMxJmxwPXRleHQx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C279de411>.

Mugsys have the feel of soft sweatpants with the look of stylish jeans. They stretch to move with you while keeping the fit juuust right—never too baggy and never too tight <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYkE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMxJmxwPXRleHQy/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8451b451>.

Sure, you could read through some 13,000+ 5-star reviews on Mugsy’s site, but we thought this one summed it up: “Just. Buy. Them. Absolute perfection.”

Try these game-changing jeans for yourself and get 10% off your first purchase with code BREW10 <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xYkE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMxJmxwPXRleHQz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8fa18f10>, plus free shipping + free returns.



WORLD

Tour de headlines Elon Musk pointing with a bird on his finger Photo Illustration: Dianna “Mick” McDougall, Photo: Getty Images/Frederic J. Brown
Elon Musk admits his tweets are not all-powerful. “Just because I tweet about something doesn’t mean people believe it or will act accordingly,” the Tesla CEO testified <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C281eb5e5> in court yesterday in a lawsuit over whether investors were duped by his 2018 tweet saying he had funding to take the electric car company private. The jury in the case is tasked with deciding whether Musk knew the tweet was false and whether it really impacted investors’ decision-making.

Elizabeth Holmes accused of trying to flee the US. Prosecutors claim the Theranos founder booked a one-way ticket <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1027a399> to Mexico after being convicted of fraud, and shows “no remorse” for pretending her company had a revolutionary product that worked when it…didn’t. They’re arguing that Holmes should report to prison in April rather than being allowed to continue living on an estate that reportedly costs $13,000 a month for upkeep while she appeals.

That consumer banking push really didn’t go well for Goldman Sachs. First came the news that the investment bank’s efforts to get into consumer banking has cost it ~$3 billion since 2020, and now it might be creating even more headaches. The Federal Reserve is now investigating <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc6892bc8> whether the right safeguards were in place for lending, according to the WSJ. The bank has already announced plans to stop making personal loans.

INTERNATIONAL POLITICS

Why Ukraine keeps asking for tanks <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D0831602d> Ukrainian soldier in a tank <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E0831602d> Diego Herrera Carcedo/Anadolu Agency/Getty Images
Ukraine’s hopes of getting German tanks have tanked (for now). Its allies met in Germany yesterday and agreed to send more weapons aid to the country, but failed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8e7aa5e1> to reach an agreement on supplying tanks.

Why are tanks still a big deal in the age of drones?

Drones and surface-to-air missile systems may be more modern, but Ukraine says it’s got to have the good ol’ armored beasts to mount a counteroffensive against Russia.

The armored vehicles equipped with heavy guns are the go-to when breaking enemy lines in a ground offensive.

Both sides are preparing for a major forward push in the spring, and state-of-the art tanks would be ideal for the flatlands in the east of the country, where much of the anticipated combat will likely take place.

Ukraine is currently fighting with Soviet- and Russian-made tanks, but they are not the next-gen machines its war effort requires. The UK recently agreed to supply 14 heavy-duty tanks, but Ukraine says it needs 300 of them.

Zoom out: While the tank situation remains uncertain, Ukraine’s allies consented to send it an assortment of weapons including air-defense systems, rockets, and artillery rounds. The US is planning a $2.5 billion arms shipment that for the first time includes the powerful Stryker armored combat vehicles.—SK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C66cbff18>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGk_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C70fde1af>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGo_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc60e2e9e>  

SPACE

Nice of you to finally stop by, green comet <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGs_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D3c98543b> Green comet surrounded by stars <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGs_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E3c98543b> Jose Francisco Hernández via NASA
Space is yet again throwing a once-in-a-lifetime viewing experience at us. A green comet is approaching <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZGw_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C6c05014a> earth for the first time since the Ice Age and may never return, so look up now or forever hold your peace.

What makes it green? The comet, nicknamed ZTF, is similar to other giant hurtling balls of dust and frozen gas, but produces a unique glowing green light. How? The sun’s ultraviolet radiation hits the diatomic carbon in the comet (which is actually just two carbon atoms fused together) and…we would go more into that, but this isn’t Space Brew.

Scientists first spotted ZTF last March, and now it’s your turn: For northern hemisphere residents, your best bet is to look north this weekend, either late in the evening or early in the morning in a place with little light pollution. The comet will be close to the Draco constellation starting tonight. You have until about early February when ZTF heads to the southern hemisphere.

Besides just looking cool…Astronomers will study the rare comet over the next month to hopefully get a better glimpse of the phenomenon that may have helped create life on earth, before it leaves our solar system. And luckily, they’ve got the James Webb Telescope <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZG0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1fbbbff5> to take some pics.—MM

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZG4_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C29fb3271>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZG8_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8d5323c1>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8a989bfd>   

TOGETHER WITH BOLT

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators A woman holding up Toadzilla, the world's largest toad Queensland Department of Environment and Science
Stat: A new amphibian has claimed the title of world’s biggest toad <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb1cdfc28>. The cane toad dubbed “Toadzilla” by the Australian park rangers who discovered her weighed in at 5.95 pounds—outweighing the previous 5.8 pound record holder. Unfortunately, Toadzilla was not given much of an opportunity to celebrate her victory, as cane toads, originally introduced to Australia to control the cane beetle population, are considered environmental pests and euthanized when found.

Quote: “After looking into this matter, we have today…issued a 42-year-old man from London with a conditional offer of fixed penalty.”

Police in Lancashire, England demonstrated their belief that no one is above the law yesterday by fining <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHI_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc27bb0d8> UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak for riding in a car without his seatbelt on. The politician, who was seen cruising in the passenger seat without his safety belt on in a social media video, admitted his mistake and said he plans to pay up. The fine for riding beltless in the UK is usually around £100 (about $124), according to the BBC.

Read: This 96-year-old doctor came up with the abortion pill after joining the French Resistance and befriending Andy Warhol. (New York Times <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHM_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca17f36a7>)

NEWS

What else is brewing
The FDA <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHQ_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc33cd64f> shot down Eli Lilly’s bid for speedy approval of its Alzheimer’s drug, donanemab.

Regal Cinemas <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd446b27e> plans to shutter 39 movie theaters, which could save its bankrupt parent company $22 million per year.

Donald Trump <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C24b79d97> dropped his lawsuit against New York’s attorney general after the judge overseeing the case fined Trump and his lawyer close to $1 million in a separate case against Hillary Clinton that he deemed “frivolous.”

The FTC <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHc_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C12b1f241> claims Martin Shkreli, better known as the pharma bro, has violated an order banning him from the drug industry.

US Border officials <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30316522.3040131/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xZHg_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMxNjUyMi4zMDQwMTMx/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C38e5e9b4> have seen a 108% spike in egg smuggling busts, as the price for a carton domestically remains stubbornly high.

 TOGETHER WITH

The Ascent <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xNFY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYzJmxwPWxvZ28/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C269e211b> 
Good morning. It’s a winter Friday, and you know what that means: Work three hours of unpaid overtime, get takeout for dinner and it’s somehow $72, watch four episodes of the glass blowing reality show, and find yourself Googling “ted mosby based on real guy?” at 2am.

Only eight more weeks until spring…

—Matty Merritt, Max Knoblauch, Neal Freyman

Markets: Remember the stock rally to start 2023? Yeah, us neither. The Dow and S&P fell for the third straight day <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN0w_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5caf6443> over concerns that—what else?—the Fed will keep hiking interest rates. Fed Vice Chair Lael Brainard didn’t calm any nerves by saying that central bankers “are determined to stay the course” until inflation is back at their 2% target.

 

FILM

Alec Baldwin will be charged in fatal ‘Rust’ shooting <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN00_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Dcb3fc1b8> Alec Baldwin <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN00_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ecb3fc1b8> Mega/Getty Images
Prosecutors announced yesterday that actor Alec Baldwin and Rust armorer Hannah Gutierrez-Reed will be charged with involuntary manslaughter <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN04_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C5f2b503b> for the on-set shooting that killed cinematographer Halyna Hutchins and injured director Joel Souza in 2021.

The charge, filed in New Mexico, is a fourth-degree felony, which means that Baldwin and Gutierrez-Reed could face up to 18 months behind bars and a $5,000 fine. But prosecutors also tacked on a provision that could result in five years of prison time because a gun was involved.

Baldwin’s attorney responded, “This decision distorts Halyna Hutchins’ tragic death and represents a terrible miscarriage of justice…we will fight these charges, and we will win.” Baldwin also sued crew members including Gutierrez-Reed and Rust assistant director David Halls in November, alleging they were negligent in handing him the gun.

How we got here

During a rehearsal for the movie Rust in October 2021, Baldwin’s gun—which was pointed at Hutchins—fired live ammunition and killed her. Baldwin has repeatedly denied pulling the trigger, saying that he had started to cock the gun and released the hammer. Gun experts have been hesitant to support Baldwin’s claim, arguing that would be essentially impossible.

So, how did this happen? Investigators for the Santa Fe Sheriff’s Department haven’t released information on how live ammunition ended up on a film set, but a separate investigation by the state’s Occupational Health and Safety Bureau found that firearm procedures on the set were lax. The agency fined Rust’s production company the maximum amount ($137,000) for not following proper safety precautions.

The report also uncovered <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN08_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C33b69e37> emails and texts that producers sent to Gutierrez-Reed urging her to spend less time on her gun-handling and training tasks to make time for her other props duties.

Two firearm misfires five days before the fatal shooting went ignored by Rust management, per the report.

Big picture: The tragedy on the Rust set renewed long-standing safety concerns in the film industry over fatal prop gun mishaps on sets, as well as the minimal training required to become a firearms specialist for film and TV.—MM

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1A_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd2874bfa>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1E_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C07aafdb1>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1I_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C410284fd>   

TOGETHER WITH THE ASCENT

Get in line or lose your spot <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xNFY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYzJmxwPXRpdGxl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1a6f717c> The Ascent <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xNFY_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYzJmxwPWltYWdl/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cbf0739fd>

WORLD

Tour de headlines Reed Hastings Picture Alliance/Getty Images
Reed Hastings pulls a Bezos and a Gates. After more than 20 years at the helm of Netflix, Hastings is giving up <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C22012a8d> his co-CEO role and becoming executive chairman, the company announced yesterday. An OG, Hastings co-founded Netflix in 1997 and grew the Blockbuster-destroying DVD rental company into an entertainment giant that disrupted Hollywood. How’s that going now, you ask? In its earnings report released yesterday, Netflix revealed it smashed subscriber targets <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1Q_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C62aecb7b> in Q4.

SCOTUS leaker remains a mystery. Eight months into its investigation, the Supreme Court said it still can’t find <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1U_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3af81c46> the culprit behind the leak of its draft opinion that overturned Roe v. Wade last summer. That bombshell leak was unprecedented—never in the court’s history had an opinion been made public before it issued its ruling—and rattled confidence in the institution. Investigators are still following a few loose strands, but they don’t sound particularly confident their efforts will turn up anything.

France rocked by protests. More than 1 million French people protested <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1Y_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1eb97a1b> President Emmanuel Macron’s controversial plan to raise the country’s minimum retirement age from 62 to 64 yesterday. Many workers also went on strike, resulting in the closing of schools and the cancellation of transit routes and flights. But the battle over the retirement age is just getting started, as major French unions announced a second day of strikes on January 31. Macron says lifting the retirement age is necessary to keep the country’s pension fund from drying up.

ECONOMY

Extraordinary times call for extraordinary measures <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1c_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Dfeaba563> Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen testifies before the House Finance Committee in the Rayburn House Office Building November 4, 2015. She is wearing a purple blazer and in the act of removing her glasses from her face. <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1c_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Efeaba563> Chip Somodevilla via Getty Images
As the US crashed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cec8917d1> into the $31.4 trillion debt ceiling yesterday, the Treasury Department began taking what it called “extraordinary measures” to prevent the government from defaulting on its debts and sparking an economic crisis.

What does that actually mean? These measures are a series of deep-cut accounting moves <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1k_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C24f23c7f> that allow the Treasury to continue making its payments. They include:

Suspending reinvestments into government funds for retired federal employees, such as the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund.

Selling existing investments in those funds to free up more outstanding debt.

And while these measures definitely aren’t ordinary…they probably aren’t so “extra,” either. The Treasury has resorted to them more than 12 times since 1985, including during the last debt-ceiling standoff in 2021.

Still, these steps amount to chugging water after eating a ghost pepper—the pain will return. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said her extraordinary measures will last through early June, giving lawmakers about five months to work out a deal to raise the debt ceiling.

Big picture: The US has never defaulted on its debt, but even the threat of it could be disastrous. The country’s first credit downgrade in history came during a debt-ceiling showdown in 2011.—NF

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN1o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C93e304bc>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xNy0_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce6f8825a>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xN18_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C007f0b93>  

RETAIL

Amazon isn’t smiling anymore <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xODA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D153e8d8f> Amazon boxes <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xODA_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E153e8d8f> Kevin Hagen/Getty Images
With the sheepish energy of someone requesting a refund from the Girl Scouts because their Thin Mints box is dented, Amazon on Wednesday announced that it will shutter <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xODE_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cfc26854b> its charitable donation program, AmazonSmile, by Feb. 20.

AmazonSmile was launched in 2013 and donated 0.5% of eligible purchases to a charity of a customer’s choice. As of the end of December, the program had doled out about $449 million to a wide variety of charities over its existence. Still, Amazon claims AmazonSmile hasn’t been as impactful as it originally hoped. The sheer number of charities in the program (1+ million globally) spread its donations too thin, the company wrote in an email to customers.

The move is yet another entry in a string of measures the tech giant has taken in recent weeks to cut costs after a pandemic hiring spree doubled its global workforce to over 1.6 million.

Those other cost cuts: Amazon announced this month that it would lay off more than 18,000 workers in what likely is the largest workforce reduction in the company’s history. Amazon has also called it quits on riskier business ventures like its telehealth service and a video chat projector for kids.—MK

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators A basketball rim attached to the Eiffel Tower Francis Scialabba
Stat: The Chicago Bulls played <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xOGw_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8156c5f0> an NBA game in Paris yesterday for the first time since Michael Jordan came to town in 1997. Since then, the league has seen an explosion in international players. In 1997, there were 29 international players on opening day rosters; this season there are 120 from 41 countries, accounting for about one-third of all players. And they’re among the best in the NBA—two international players (Serbia’s Nikola Jokić and Greece’s Giannis Antetokounmpo) won the last four MVP awards.

Quote: “Everything is on the table.”

Could FTX be resurrected? Maybe <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xODU_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cba7a6a7e>, according to its new CEO. John J. Ray III, in his first interview since taking over the company, told the WSJ that he created a task force to explore the possibility of reviving the bankrupt crypto exchange, and if they find that it makes sense, “we’ll do it.” FTX’s maligned token FTT, which was at the center of its epic blow-up, spiked more than 30% after Ray’s comments were published.

ANSWER

13112221. This is a pretty diabolical set of integers known as the “Look-and-say sequence <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xOGs_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDMwNDUwNy4zNDcyMzYz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C192debf5>.” To get the next number in the sequence, you read off the digits of the previous item.

For instance, “1” is “one one” so the next item is “11.” From that comes “two ones,” so you write down “21” and so on. So, to get the next term in the sequence above, it would be “one three, one one, two twos, two ones.”

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zSj9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMzA0NTA3LjM0NzIzNjM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C156b5104>  <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zSz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMzA0NTA3LjM0NzIzNjM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7b5df2f5>  <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zTD9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMzA0NTA3LjM0NzIzNjM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cfa3740e0>  <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zTT9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMzA0NTA3LjM0NzIzNjM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce3ea8641>  <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zTj9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMzA0NTA3LjM0NzIzNjM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8565acdc>  <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30304507.3472363/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9zTz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMzA0NTA3LjM0NzIzNjM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C2d3a248a>

Morning Brew <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9yWj9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ee38b746a>

 TOGETHER WITH

Masterworks <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9fVz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzMmbHA9bG9nbw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb0485cec> 
Good morning. The countdown to economic catastrophe has officially begun . The US will hit its debt ceiling today, though Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said she’ll implement “extraordinary measures” that will keep the government from defaulting on its debt until probably early June.

Still, June isn’t that far away, and Congress needs to work out a deal pronto to raise the government’s borrowing cap and avert almost assured economic turmoil and market chaos.

What were we saying again? Oh yeah, good morning.

—Max Knoblauch, Jamie Wilde, Matty Merritt, Abby Rubenstein, Neal Freyman

Markets: Stocks tanked <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM2k_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cce7db26e> yesterday, with the Dow plunging, the S&P having its worst day since mid-December, and the Nasdaq coming down from a seven- day rally. As investors started heeding recession signals again after new data revealed weak retail sales during the holiday season last month, companies that sell consumer staples were hit especially hard.

 

ENTREPRENEURSHIP

The pandemic’s entrepreneurial boom isn’t over yet <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM2o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2De36b5957> Mark Cuban on Shark Tank <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM2o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ee36b5957> Shark Tank/ABC Network via Giphy
At the rate Americans are creating new businesses, Shark Tank is going to need to increase its episode count by about 4,000 to keep up with demand. More than 5 million new business applications were filed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM2s_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C7844788f> in 2022, according to new data from the US Census Bureau.

About 14,000 new business applications were filed in the US every day last year—although it’s still too soon to know how many of those aspiring Scrub Daddies will actually make it off the ground.

Whether this represents a testament to the country’s entrepreneurial spirit, an indictment of 9-to-5s, or simply a case of everyone seeing the same TikTok about the tax benefits of forming an LLC, it’s a sign that the pandemic-era startup boom may be here to stay.

And it was quite a boom

Despite the vast number of Steve Jobs biopics that were being created, the US was actually experiencing a 40-year decline in entrepreneurship before the pandemic, per the NYT. But then things changed: The number of new businesses created in 2020 increased by 24% from 2019 to 4.3 million as laid-off workers found their savings accounts boosted by stimulus payments and a bull market. Also helpful: rock-bottom interest rates.

The trend continued in 2021, ballooning to 5.4 million applications.

And now we know that the swell continued into 2022. But some areas saw more growth than others. The Southern US has had a 53% increase in new businesses since 2019, with the most growth coming from Florida and Texas, per Bloomberg analysis. New England, on the other hand, is falling below the national average.

Looking ahead…we’ll have to wait and see if these businesses thrive and the trend continues in 2023. A looming potential recession, high inflation, and personal savings dropping to near 60-year lows (per the Bureau of Economic Analysis) all signal turbulence ahead for new companies, which already have a roughly 50% failure rate during good economic times.—MK

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM2w_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8ccbd911>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM20_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C921dcbf0>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM24_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C78f59fb6>   

TOGETHER WITH MASTERWORKS

Which platform delivered millions to investors in 2022? <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9fVz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzMmbHA9dGl0bGU/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C1ee1b33d> Masterworks <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9fVz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzMmbHA9aW1hZ2U/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C27686b58>
In the same year everyday investors lost a whopping $350b, Masterworks <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9fVz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzMmbHA9dGV4dDE/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce5c26007> had its best year ever. Their 9 art sales returned $25.8 million to investors—a record amount. Talk about a happy new year…

So, what did investors do with their cash? Charter a yacht in Ibiza? Finally close on that Alpaca farm? Maybe save a little? Naaaah.

Either way, Masterworks wants to do the same thing for you. This fintech unicorn <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9fVz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzMmbHA9dGV4dDI/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C87333b59> is unlocking an asset class that was once available only to billionaires.

To kick off the new year, Masterworks is inviting Morning Brew readers to open a free, no-obligation account today. Isn’t it time you check them out <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9fVz9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjkwOTE1LjMwNjk3NzMmbHA9dGV4dDM/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cc2c5326e>?



WORLD

Tour de headlines The Microsoft logo David Becker/Getty Images
Tech layoffs continue. Microsoft announced plans to cut <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM28_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cb1f86f14> 10,000 employees yesterday, and Amazon began a round of layoffs that will impact 18,000 people. These are just the latest tech company layoffs, many of which have begun thinning their ranks after rapidly expanding during the pandemic now that they’re facing rising interest rates, smaller digital ad budgets, and less consumer spending. According to the tracker Layoffs.fyi, the sector shed more than 154,000 jobs in 2022 and has already cut around ~37,500 this year.

Ukraine helicopter crash kills 14. Ukraine’s Interior Minister Denys Monastyrskyi, who oversaw police and security forces, was among those who died when a helicopter <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3A_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C307e31ee> crashed into a kindergarten in a Kyiv suburb yesterday. Monastyrskyi is the highest ranking Ukrainian official to die since Russia invaded the country. Ukraine said it had not yet determined if the crash, which occurred amidst a dense fog, was caused by an attack or an accident.

The Avengers are going back to China. Disney said it will release <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3E_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cef394372> two Marvel films in China in February, ending what amounted to a three-year ban on the franchise by the country’s censors that likely cost the studio hundreds of millions of dollars. Black Panther: Wakanda Forever and Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania will be the first Marvel movies to open in China, the world’s second-largest movie market, since 2019—a sign that China may be easing up on restrictions for new Hollywood films.

FASHION

Shein’s valuation about as sturdy as its clothes <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3I_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D794e8a78> Shein shopping bag. <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3I_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E794e8a78> Yuichi Yamazaki/Getty Images
Not even the powerhouse of dresses with weird cutouts has been spared by investors’ newfound skepticism toward exorbitant tech company valuations. Shein, the fast-fashion retailer that bills itself as a tech firm, is looking to raise <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ca1b574c9> $3 billion more from its existing investors at a $64 billion valuation—a sharp drop from the $100 billion valuation the company had in April, according to the Financial Times.

Fast rise: Shein grew rapidly in the last few years, and was considered a no-brainer investment for backers flush with cash.

Fast fall: Now, after spending years throwing billions at any tech company whose slide deck had the word “disruptor” in it, VCs are getting stingy as interest rates rise and the global economy slows down. So, Shein (along with a lot of other companies) is stuck entering a “down round”—i.e., being forced to raise funds at a much lower valuation, the FT reported, though the company told the FT it “denied the accuracy” of some of the report.

But all those tissue-thin tees are still big business. Despite a collage of controversies <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3Q_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C36579901>, Shein brought in $15.7 billion in revenue in 2021, per Reuters, and is said to have only grown last year.—MM

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3U_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf9168d71>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3Y_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C832c5d35>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3c_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cbb8bcb75>  

TECH

Twitter HQ has a garage sale <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2D91ba477a> A Twitter labeled gavel hits a Bid button <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2E91ba477a> Morning Brew
A giant bird statue, blue soundproof booth, pizza oven…apparently all of these things no longer spark joy for Twitter CEO Elon Musk.

The social media company kicked off 2023 by listing 631 items from its San Francisco headquarters in a virtual auction <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3k_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cabcdc134> that concluded yesterday afternoon. Some fun facts:

A single bird statue sold for $100,000.

Over 20,000 people registered to bid, making this the most popular auction that Heritage Global—which also ran an Enron auction—has ever organized.

Twitter is pinching pennies millions

Musk said in December that Twitter was on track to lose $3 billion net annually when he acquired it in October, and Platformer recently reported <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM3o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C8c0ae535> that the company’s daily revenue is down 40%. To counteract that, Musk’s version of saving ketchup packets in the fridge has included extreme measures, like laying off over 50% of workers and not paying rent <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0E_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C4bd10114>, as well as smaller moves, like this auction and deciding there really is no such thing <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0I_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3dfd0b38> as a free (corporate) lunch.—JW

<https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0M_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf39e8198>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0Q_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf9164876>   <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0U_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Ce2d1eb07>

GRAB BAG

Key performance indicators A fish in a lab beaker Hannah Minn
Stat: A new study <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0Y_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cd69ed5aa> shows that eating even just one freshwater fish caught in the US puts the same amount of toxic “forever chemicals” into your system as drinking PFAS-contaminated water for a month. So, maybe order the chicken next time if you’re looking to get more lean protein into your diet.

Quote: “I am inevitable. I am forever. Meow. Hehehehe.”

Fresh off a surprisingly spicy cheating scandal, the chess world is now buzzing over something new: a game-playing bot with a big-eyed kitten for an avatar that goes by Mittens <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0c_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C14bfe278> and talks cat-inflected trash to its opponents. People must enjoy being mocked by a cute kitty while they deploy their Sicilian Defense because ever since Chess.com introduced the bot at the beginning of January, the site has averaged 27.5 million games per day—putting it on track for 40% more games to be played on the site this month than any other in its history (including back when everyone was watching The Queen’s Gambit).

Read: Why nearly everyone, including you, is profiting from a shoplifting wave. (Curbed <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cccfb95fe>)

NEWS

What else is brewing
New Zealand’s Prime Minister <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM1g_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C56b9490c> Jacinda Ardern unexpectedly announced yesterday that she will step down by Feb. 7, saying she didn’t “have enough in the tank” to continue in the role.

Party City <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0k_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C54481be3> has filed for bankruptcy to reorganize its debt after stumbling in its efforts to rebound from the pandemic.

The US <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0o_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C9475569f> arrested the founder of crypto exchange Bitzlato (a Russian national who ran the Hong Kong-based company), claiming the site was used to launder $700 million.

The world’s oldest person <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0s_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cfb908db3>, a French nun known as Sister André, has died at age 118 after living through the 1918 flu and the Covid pandemic.

Donald Trump’s <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM0w_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C25a3e12c> campaign has asked Meta to let the former president back on Facebook.

Netflix <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM04_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C3920b365> is hiring a flight attendant for its corporate jet, and says the right candidate will be discreet and could make as much as $385,000 per year.



BREW'S BETS

The ’90s were lit: Here’s a look at what books from the 1990s <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM08_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C76dd3784> we’re reading in college classes now.

Go with your gut: Watch legendary music producer Rick Rubin drop wisdom <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30290915.3069773/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy8xM1A_bWlkPTdjZDNkN2VmY2IyYjVkMWE2Y2JlMGJmMDkzMWY0YjJmJmNpZD0zMDI5MDkxNS4zMDY5Nzcz/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2Cf700be2b> like “I have no technical ability. And I know nothing about music.”

 TOGETHER WITH

Fundrise <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30279635.3066208/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9aeT9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjc5NjM1LjMwNjYyMDgmbHA9bG9nbw/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C98088e71> 
Good morning. If you’re having trouble keeping up with all of your group chats, one dad’s message to his family provides an off-the-shelf template for anyone to use (via @snakel3t <https://link.morningbrew.com/click/30279635.3066208/aHR0cHM6Ly9saW5rcy5tb3JuaW5nYnJldy5jb20vYy9aej9taWQ9N2NkM2Q3ZWZjYjJiNWQxYTZjYmUwYmYwOTMxZjRiMmYmY2lkPTMwMjc5NjM1LjMwNjYyMDg/62b63bd3ff8136015c0bece2C007dd7b0>):

“I can’t keep up with the pressure of always having to lol or like or heart everyone’s random thoughts, pics and amusements.

For all future texts: I love them, laugh at them, or like them, unless it’s bad, then I dislike them.

In perpetuity.

I can’t live with this pressure. I’m out.”

—Matty Merritt, Sam Klebanov, Max Knoblauch, Neal Freyman, Holly Van Leuven
